DOC.brief_summary: An historical data comparator study child relapsed/refactory acute lymphoblastic leukemia ( ALL ) .
DOC.brief_title: Historical Data Analysis Complete Remission Children With R/R Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia ( ALL )
DOC.detailed_description: A retrospective observational study review historical complete remission pediatric patient either relapsed refractory B-precursor acute lymphoblastic leukemia ( ALL )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Pediatric ( age le 18 year ) patient relapse refractory Bcell precursor ALL , specifically 2nd later relapse chemotherapy ( prior transplantation ) , Relapse HSCT , Refractory disease Had treatment relapse refractory disease 20052012 Has data available ALL treatment , include number salvage treatment , response status therapy , HSCT Exclusion criterion : No CNS involvement relapse No previous treatment blinatumomab
